member.name: T:EvoPdf.PdfToText.ContextImpersonationLogonMode
member.summary: The logon mode for impersonation

member.name: F:EvoPdf.PdfToText.ContextImpersonationLogonMode.Automatic
member.summary: Automatic logon

member.name: F:EvoPdf.PdfToText.ContextImpersonationLogonMode.Explicit
member.summary: Explicit logon

member.name: T:EvoPdf.PdfToText.ContextImpersonationOptions
member.summary: This class encapsulates the options to control the context impersonation during tool execution

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.ContextImpersonationOptions.CurrentUserImpersonation
member.summary: A flag indicating if the tool should impersonate the current user during execution. By default this property is false.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.ContextImpersonationOptions.Username
member.summary: The name of the user to logon before execution. The and properties must also be set. This property has priority over the property. By default this property is not set.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.ContextImpersonationOptions.Domain
member.summary: The user Windows domain name. This property together with property define the user to logon before execution. If the user is not part of a Windows domain the machine name can be used. By default this property is not set.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.ContextImpersonationOptions.Password
member.summary: The password of the user specified by and properties. By default this property is not set.

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.ContextImpersonationOptions.LogonMode
member.summary: The logon mode of the user before execution. This property has effect only when a username for impersonation is specified. The default logon mode is automatic.

member.name: T:EvoPdf.PdfToText.FindTextLocation

member.summary: The text X location in PDF page

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.FindTextLocation.Y
member.summary: The text Y location in PDF page

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.FindTextLocation.Width
member.summary: The text width in PDF page

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.FindTextLocation.Height
member.summary: The text height in PDF page

member.name: T:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextConverter
member.summary: This class encapsulates the PDF to Text Converter functionality and allows you to extract the text from PDF documents and to search text in PDF documents

member.name: M:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextConverter.#ctor
member.summary: PDF to Text constructor

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextConverter.RunTimeoutSec
member.summary: The maximum time allowed for this tool to run

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextConverter.Layout
member.summary: The text layout in the resulted text document

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextConverter.AddHtmlMetaTags
member.summary: A flag indicating if the converter should wrap the resulted text in a HTML document. The default value is false

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextConverter.HtmlCharset
member.summary: The charset of the HTML document wrapping the resulted text

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextConverter.MarkPageBreaks
member.summary: A flag indicating if the page breaks should be marked by special character in the resulted PDF document. The default value is false

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextConverter.UserPassword
member.summary: The user password to be used to open a password protected PDF document

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextConverter.OwnerPassword
member.summary: The owner password to be used to open a password protected PDF document

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextConverter.LicenseKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the license key string received from vendor. If this property is null the tool will automatically enter in evaluation mode

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextConverter.PAGE_BREAK_MARK
member.summary: The special character to mark the PDF pages in the resulted PDF document

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextConverter.ImpersonationOptions
member.summary: The impersonation options used during tool execution

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextConverter.PdfToolFullPath
member.summary: Sets the full path of the .dat resource file. By default this file is expected to be found in the same folder with .dll assembly

member.name: P:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextConverter.PdfDocumentInfo
member.summary: Gets the object encapsulating the PDF document properties. This objects is populated after tool execution finished

member.summary: Converts all the pages of a PDF file to text

member.returns: The text from PDF document

The start page number
member.returns: The text from PDF document

member.name: M:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextConverter.FindText(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Searches for a given text in all the pages of a PDF file
member.param: The full path of the PDF file to search
The text to find
A flag indicating if the search should match case
A flag indicating if the search should match whole words
member.returns: The records containing the location of the searched text in PDF document pages

member.name: T:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextException
member.summary: This class represents an exception thrown by the PDF to Text converter

member.name: M:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a PDF to Text exception with the given error message
member.param: The exception message

member.name: M:EvoPdf.PdfToText.PdfToTextException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Constructs a PDF to Text exception with the given error message and the given inner exception object
member.param: The exception message
The inner exception that triggered this exception

member.name: T:EvoPdf.PdfToText.TextLayout
member.summary: The possible layouts of the resulted text

member.name: F:EvoPdf.PdfToText.TextLayout.OriginalLayout
member.summary: The resulted text preserves the visual layout of the text in PDF document

member.name: F:EvoPdf.PdfToText.TextLayout.ReadingLayout
member.summary: The resulted text preserves the reading order of the text in PDF document

member.name: F:EvoPdf.PdfToText.TextLayout.TableModeLayout
member.summary: The resulted text preserves the visual layout of the text as much as possible in a table format

member.name: F:EvoPdf.PdfToText.TextLayout.FixedLineSpacingLayout
member.summary: The resulted text uses a fixed font with fixed line spacing

member.name: F:EvoPdf.PdfToText.TextLayout.PdfInternalOrderLayout
member.summary: The resulted text is output keeping the internal order of the text in PDF document
